Name: Conquest Emperor
About the game: This is a match-3 RPG game! You are called to another world. This is a world ruled by empresses, all you have to do is defeat and conquer all empresses and eventually become the king of Galan. Each Empress has her own unique skill mechanics, which will get stronger as the game progresses. You need to use items and skills reasonably to defeat them. The full version has 6~7 characters. The current Early Access EA completion is 20%, complete 3 characters . The price of the full version will be increased by 300%. ·【God King】Evludi ·【Elf King】Loros ·[King of Humans] Di Shia ·【Dragon King】Lan (Unfinished)
